mapper.select: SELECT f.film_id AS filmId, f.title AS title, f.description AS description, f.release_year AS releaseYear, f.language_id AS languageId, f.original_language_id AS originalLanguageId, f.rental_duration AS rentalDuration, f.rental_rate AS rentalRate, f.length AS length, f.replacement_cost AS replacementCost, f.rating AS rating, f.special_features AS specialFeatures, f.last_update AS lastUpdate FROM film f
